Max Clifford , the well-known public relations guru who reportedly received a lucrative settlement when his phones were tapped, said that Edmonson's firing and Andy Coulson 's resignation was like a volcano that is starting to erupt. `` There will be huge explosions all over Fleet Street if police get to the truth,'' he told the BBC. Around the Hill, Kirsten Gillibrand has forged a reputation as hardworking, methodical, and relentless. She goes to the floor with little notecards. She buttonholes senators. She does it right, says longtime Harry Reid aide Jim Manley . Just days after her special-election win, the senator was working the phones on the 9/11 bill while en route to Afghanistan.
